text: Apani ki bhebe dekhenani ye, nabhomandala o bhumandale ya kichu ache, allaha ta janena. Tina byaktira emana kona paramarsa haya na yate tini caturtha na thakena ebam pamca janera'o haya na, yate tini sastha na thakena tara etadapeksa kama hoka ba besi hoka tara yekhane'i thakuka na kena tini tadera sathe achena, tara ya kare, tini keyamatera dina ta taderake janiye dibena. Niscaya allaha sarbabisaye samyaka jnata.
